page.title: 06PROFESSIONS,JOBS - EARLEY
page.content: {Earley St.Peter's C.E.School.} Out of our parents in the school 42% of dads have professions and 58% are non-professional.There are no particular common professions or jobs. The University and College give several parents occupations connected with Education. There are quite a few computer experts, several work for Racal. One or two are connected with the hospital and we have 3 ministers amongst our dads. The non-professional include plumbers, bricklayers, tilers, waiters,shop owners and assistants and several salesman. 65% of our mums go out to work (52 only part time). 24% of mums hold professional jobs. Quite a few are teachers,1 dentist, 1 accountant, and 1 doctor.The rest are secretaries, sales ladies,florists and 2 do ironing. 35% are housewives,most with children in the Infants.
